content: a quick leaf braid that can be used to embellish or edge or decorate your chosen item the piece featured was made in thread weight with a 1 75 mm hook also looks very good made with fingering/sport - so try it out with whatever yarn you please start and end with a length of chain to whip up a pretty necklace - or make a length and drape around your computer monitor to remind you of spring instructions in us and uk terminology with both written and photo instructions
